data.message: Catalyst Covenant Church is a great option if you live in Bailey! 10am service this morning!
Hey Emily! I live on St. Paul campus and would be wiling to drive you to Hope any Sunday at 9 if you needed a weekly ride.
Kelsey is kinda scary and aggressive, though. Be careful.

message: Sorry this is such short notice, but is there anyone driving to the 9am Hope service that would be able to hit up Bailey Hall to pick me up? I'll pay in gas money and my irresistable charm :)
